Zach Sheely, National Guard Bureau KERRVILLE, Texas – Early on July 4, almost 30 inches of rain fell within hours across Central Texas’s Hill Country, surging the Guadalupe River and triggering catastrophic flash flooding. articles.title: Norfolk City Jail Awarded National Accreditation for Quality Health Care Services - City of Norfolk (.gov)
articles.summary: Norfolk City Jail Awarded National Accreditation for Quality Health Care Services The Norfolk City Jail has earned accreditation from the National Commission on Correctional Health Care (NCCHC) by demonstrating compliance with NCCHC’s nationally recognized standards of care for correctional health services in jails. Accreditation recognizes the Norfolk City Jail’s commitment to providing quality health services for the incarcerated population. To...
